title: Shawn Achor, Part 2: How to Find Happiness in Today’s World
description: The conversation with Harvard-trained researcher and New York Times bestselling author Shawn Achor continues. Shawn offers advice on how to turn down the noise of the electronic, hyper-connected world we live in, which he says is blocking us from true happiness. Shawn also shares how we can increase the levels of happiness for others in our lives.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
